thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 27 of 61
thread.title: Joao

author: Joao
title: Joao
text: Made a few purchases from Ssense and go on the store site regularly to browse, great range of brands and collections. Was close to giving 4 stars as certain pieces are priced significantly higher than elsewhere, but Ssense make up for it by providing a huge range of pieces to choose from, tend to find specific items on here that aren't stocked anywhere else. On top of that service has always been great and never had any problems.
